O amohelehile ho MomConnect wa Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle. Ka kopo kgetha:
Baby and Pregnancy info (English only): Tsebo ka Lesea le Boimana (Senyesemane feela)
MomConnect sends free support SMSs to pr: MomConnect o romela mahala diSMS tsa tshehetso ho bomme ba immeng. Na o  imme kapa o belaela hore o imme?
You have previously opted out of MomConn: Nakong e fetileng o kgethile ho tswa ho diSMS tsa MomConnect. Ka kopo tiisa hore o ka rata ho kgetha ho amohela melaetsa hape.
You have chosen not to receive MomConnec: O kgethile ho se fumane diSMS tsa MomConnect mme kahoo ha o kgone ho qeta ngodiso.
We are sorry but this service is only fo: Re kopa tshwarelo empa tshebeletso ena ke ya bomme ba immeng feela. Ha o na le tse ding dingongoreho ka bophelo ka kopo etela tleleniki ya hao e haufi.
We need some info to message you. This i: Re batla tsebo e itseng ho romela melaetsa.Hona ho ka thoko mme ho sebediswa feela ho o thusa ha o ya tleleniki.
